pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Modeling of Count Processes // A toolkit for flexible modeling of count processes where data (over- or under-) dispersion exists. Estimations can be obtained under two data constructs where one has: (1) data on number of events in an s-unit time interval, or (2) only wait-time data. This package is supplementary to the work set forth in Zhu et al. (2016) doi:10.1080/00031305.2016.1234976.
